chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (n : nat) (x : nat -> nat) (i : nat), i <= n -> Divides (prod i x) (prod n x)

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
prod = fun (n : nat) (x : nat -> nat) => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => nat) 1 (fun n0 Hrecn : nat => x n0 * Hrecn) n : nat -> (nat -> nat) -> nat Arguments prod _%nat_scope _%function_scope
Divides = fun n m : nat => exists q : nat, m = n * q : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Divides (_ _)%nat_scope
divProd : forall (n : nat) (x : nat -> nat) (i : nat), i < n -> Divides (x i) (prod n x)
coPrimeProd : forall (n : nat) (x : nat -> nat), (forall z1 z2 : nat, z1 < S n -> z2 < S n -> z1 <> z2 -> CoPrime (x z1) (x z2)) -> (forall z : nat, z < S n -> x z > 0) -> CoPrime (prod n x) (x n)
coPrimeSeq : forall c i j n : nat, Divides (factorial n) c -> i <> j -> i <= n -> j <= n -> CoPrime (coPrimeBeta i c) (coPrimeBeta j c)
coPrimeSeqHelp : forall c i j n : nat, Divides (factorial n) c -> i < j -> i <= n -> j <= n -> CoPrime (S (c * S i)) (S (c * S j))
prodBig1 : forall (n : nat) (x : nat -> nat), (forall z : nat, z < n -> x z > 0) -> prod n x > 0
dec.decDeMorgan : forall (N : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P n \/ ~ P n) -> (exists x : nat, x < N /\ P x) < -> ~ (forall x : nat, x < N -> ~ P x)
common_div = fun (x y : Z) (d : nat) => Divides d (Z.abs_nat x) /\ Divides d (Z.abs_nat y) : Z -> Z -> nat -> Prop Arguments common_div (_ _)%Z_scope _%nat_scope
chRem : forall (n : nat) (x : nat -> nat), (forall z1 z2 : nat, z1 < n -> z2 < n -> z1 <> z2 -> CoPrime (x z1) (x z2)) -> forall (y : nat -> nat) (py : forall z : nat, z < n -> y z < x z), {a : nat | a < prod n x /\ (forall (z : nat) (pz : z < n), y z = snd (proj1_sig (modulo (x z) (ltgt1 (y z) (x z) (py z pz)) a)))}
sameProd : forall (n : nat) (x1 x2 : nat -> nat), (forall z : nat, z < n -> x1 z = x2 z) -> prod n x1 = prod n x2
le_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), P n -> (forall m : nat, n <= m -> P m -> P (S m)) -> forall n0 : nat, n <= n0 -> P n0
inj_abs_pos : forall x : Z, (x >= 0)%Z -> Z.of_nat (Z.abs_nat x) = x
inj_abs_neg : forall x : Z, (x < 0)%Z -> Z.of_nat (Z.abs_nat x) = (- x)%Z
Inductive le (n : nat) : nat -> Prop := le_n : n <= n | le_S : forall m : nat, n <= m -> n <= S m Arguments le (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments le_n _%nat_scope Arguments le_S (_ _)%nat_scope
lt_wf_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), (forall n0 : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n0 -> P m) -> P n0) -> P n
List.firstn_length_le : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat), n <= length l -> length (List.firstn n l) = n
gcd_lincomb_nat : forall x y d : nat, x > 0 -> gcd (Z.of_nat x) (Z.of_nat y) d -> LinComb (Z.of_nat d) (Z.of_nat x) (Z.of_nat y)
div_absexp_compat : forall (b : Z) (d : nat), Divides d (Z.abs_nat b) -> forall n : nat, Divides d (Z.abs_nat (exp.Exp b (S n)))
div_le : forall d n : nat, 0 < n -> Divides d n -> d <= n
primedivmult : forall p n m : nat, Prime p -> Divides p (n * m) -> Divides p n \/ Divides p m
modulo.moddivmin : forall (a b : Z) (n : nat), modulo.Mod a b n < -> Divides n (Z.abs_nat (a - b))
sqrdivbound : forall n d : nat, Divides d n -> exists x : nat, Divides x n /\ x * x <= n /\ (x = d \/ d * x = n)
Init.Nat.pow = fix pow (n m : nat) {struct m} : nat := match m with | 0 => 1 | S m0 => n * pow n m0 end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.pow (_ _)%nat_scope
modulo.Mod = fun (a b : Z) (n : nat) => exists q : Z, a = (b + Z.of_nat n * q)%Z : Z -> Z -> nat -> Prop Arguments modulo.Mod (_ _)%Z_scope _%nat_scope
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
nat_rec : forall P : nat -> Set, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
Nat.ls'_ls'' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, (forall n : nat, n <= z -> (forall m : nat, m <= z -> S n <= m -> A m) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, (forall m : nat, m <= z -> n <= m -> A m) < -> (forall m : nat, m <= z -> S n <= m -> A m)
div_le1 : forall n d : nat, Divides d (S n) -> d <= S n
Init.Nat.add = fix add (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => m | S p => S (add p m) end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.add (_ _)%nat_scope
primepropdiv : forall n : nat, n > 1 -> (forall q : nat, Prime q -> Divides q n -> q * q > n) -> Prime n
Z.lt_le_trans : forall n m p : Z, (n < m)%Z -> (m <= p)%Z -> (n < p)%Z

```coq
intros n x i H.
induction n as [|n' Hrecn'].
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. assert (Divides (x i) (prod (S n') x)) by eauto.
  rewrite coPrimeSeqHelp with (c := x i) (i := i) (j := n') (n := S n').
  auto.
Qed.```

original: intros n x i H. induction n as [|n' Hrecn']. - simpl. auto. - simpl. assert (Divides (x i) (prod (S n') x)) by eauto. rewrite coPrimeSeqHelp with (c := x i) (i := i) (j := n') (n := S n'). auto.
